page.title: 13HOW A YOUNGSTER SEES IBSTOCK
page.content:
Ibstock is quite big compared to some villages in Leicestershire. It could be improved by having better shops and better toilet facilities. The people are very friendly and the houses are near to the shops. There could be more parks for children, an outdoor swimming pool and tennis courts because if you want to do some thing like this you have to travel at least three miles. There are three schools in the village, a few pubs and bingo places if you fancy that sort of thing. I don't like people who write on walls because they make Ibstock look a mess. Melbourne Road has too many fast cars whizzing past. You can't see them coming when you cross the road.
By{Melanie Handford (aged 10).
